ModMetaData.name: [MIS] - Arknights
ModMetaData.author: M.I.S. Group
ModMetaData.description:
这是一款明日方舟同人模组 历经一年半的时间终于打磨成形，项目发起人墨鱼丸（蘑菇） 历经艰苦奋斗（指开发人员阳了个阳）终于发布
简介/ 这个mod为环世界增添了一个新的家具“招募台” 玩家可以通过用白银手工加工点制作招募券来使用招募台，进行招募干员，我们准备了百余套优质干员时装 干员不仅仅是干员服装，特性，属性，故事背景都和游戏剧情中一样，招募的干员将有血有肉加入殖民地与玩家互动
功能// mod实现了语音和立绘 语音可以在设置中开关，可以设置反应时间 （你可以把时间拉倒最短和琴柳玩琴流感） 立绘功能（没啥好说的二次元）
常见问题///
Q:可以中途加入/删除这个MOD吗 A:几乎不可以中途删除。中途加入没有经过测试。建议新开档玩。
Q:如何招募干员 A:通讯技术科技 -> 手工加工点生产招募券 -> 建造招募台 -> 选择心仪的干员
Q:我觉得xx干员贴图不好看 A:画师会改但也请对现有的贴图保持理解 画师都是未成年人，没有经过专业绘画训练
Q:会有xx功能吗？ A:如果合理或者有意思都会做，可以去创意工坊群提出意见或者建议
Q:为什么干员没有语音/不显示立绘/立绘位置很奇怪 A:MOD设置里面可以打开
Q:干员贴图非常糊 A:可以任意选用其他高清MOD.如:Vanilla Expanded Framework,然后MOD设置里关闭贴图缓存;也可以搜HD然后选自己喜欢的.
Q:我想赞助本MOD/我会xml、c#、绘画，希望加入mod制作 A:可以去创意工坊群留言或参与讨论
qq1群:383917697 (严禁键政) qq2群:489397547 (比较自由)
本MOD目前处于测试阶段，没有经历过高压测试，有一定可能会导致坏档/闪退。建议新开档玩，并于出现bug提交反馈。
祝各位游戏愉快
This is a MOD inspired by mobile game Arknights.
A new buildable furniture “Recruit Console” is added. Player can use it with recruit tickets(crafted at crafting spot) to recruit an operator from mobile game Arknights. Currently we prepared 100+ operators with full set of apparel, weapon, trait, backstory and more.
Features// Play operators' voice Display operators' portrait Both are adjustable in Mod option
FAQ/// Q:Can I add/delete this MOD in a play A:Delete this MOD in middle of a save is risky. Adding to exist save is also not tested. A new save is recommended.
Q:How can I recruit an operator A:Microelectronics technology -> make a recruit ticket at crafting spot -> build a recruit console -> recruit your favorite operator
Q:I think certain operator is ugly A:Illustrators will try to make every operator decent however please keep understands and tolerant to current textures. Illustrators are all juveniles, did not received professional painting training.
Q:Will this mod have certain feature? A:It is possible to add fan suggested feature/content if it is reasonable or attractive. Please leave your valuable comment at steam workshop.
Q:Why my operators do not talk/do not have portrait/location of portrait is strange A:Switchs and adjustment are in MOD options.
Q:Why textures of operators are in low resolution A:Use any HD MOD you like, for instance Vanilla Expanded Framework.
Q:I have other suggestions A:Please leave them at steam workshop.
Q:Certain place lacks English translate A:Apologize for any inconvenience. We currently do not have enough manpower to complete translation. Warning: This MOD is currently at test phase, lacking of high pressure test, result in possibility to cause crash. Please do not play with a very valuable save, and report bugs.
Have a pleasant play with arknights operators!
